schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts in a flash and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the country road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: At around 9:30 p.m., a 44-year-old driver of a VW coming from Merklingen wanted to turn left onto the state road 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: In doing so, she overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist coming from Nellingen, who had the right of way.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: In the collision hand and foot brake lever fly away
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker tried to avoid the car, but still hit the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: As a result of the grazing action, the hand and foot brake levers on the Suzuki were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Quick-witted, he steered his motorcycle into the green strip next to the roadway and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: By the collision with the car the Biker suffered nevertheless an injury at the Beim and had to be treated in a hospital.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona mass infection: 174 harvesters infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a Corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service is monitoring the curfew.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvesters tested positive for the corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the serial examination, as the district office Dingolfing-Landau announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to prevent further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected at the plant - this was the reason for the row test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beet - but only the cucumbers for pickling jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a good 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to citizens to remain calm: "According to our information, it is a closed circle of people."
np-coburg.de.105627.10: Infected and non-infected employees have been separated on the farm, and the area is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and the SPD placed joint responsibility on the state government.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting to control the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infection events spread and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary manager of the Green Party.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD has a similar view: "We have already called for a special control program for farms with harvest workers as well after the Corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "Especially the hygiene conditions at the workplace and the living conditions must be sharply controlled from our point of view.
np-coburg.de.105627.17: The outbreak had come "with notice," he said.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Aidenbachstraße subway station: Dangerous altercation: 19-year-old falls into railroad bed after being shoved
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: During an argument between two groups of young people at the Aidenbachstraße subway station, a 19-year-old fell down after being pushed and slid into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - At around 4:15 p.m. on Friday, an argument broke out between two groups of young people at the Aidenbachstraße subway station.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passerby alerted the police, who arrived with several patrols.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a Munich resident (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slipped over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen man to climb out of the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an arriving train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, the two people then got into a fight again.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene, but his personal details were subsequently established.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to police station 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention period
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: However, according to a media report, German Interior Minister Horst Seehofer is calling for an extension of the retention period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to use it to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, German Interior Minister Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for an extended data retention period - half a year instead of the planned ten weeks.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As reported by Bild am Sonntag, Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: According to the letter, Seehofer wants to use it to strengthen measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He considers it sensible to "make urgently needed adjustments to the law already now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision by the ECJ on the matter is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the changes beforehand so that they could be applied immediately after a possible positive ruling, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A Justice Ministry spokesman told the newspaper that it would only be possible to meaningfully examine whether legal adjustments were needed once the courts had ruled.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the states, had already spoken out in June in favor of data retention.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), basketball professional of the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarters at Disney World in Orlando/Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to U.S. media reports, however, he still visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN, is back in Isloation, being tested daily for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for the visit: chicken wings.
bild.255016.7: Last February, "Sweet Lou", as he is known in the NBA, already expressed his love for these very wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, ed.) have the best wings in town."
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter on Sunday that the NBA has imposed a ten-day quarantine on Williams.
bild.255016.10: This means that the Clippers star will miss the first two official games after the test game phase.
bild.255016.11: At Disney World, the NBA wants to finish the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the best 22 teams are preparing for the season finale, which begins Friday night, with practice games.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on Corona situation after mass infection
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) has already announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has startled authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvest workers from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have become infected with the Corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is cordoned off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, and food is being delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free Corona tests to the 3300 or so residents of the community.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvesters had little contact with the local population, the district office so far assumes that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Pangs of conscience": confession of suspected Nantes arsonist.
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense lawyer added: "He deeply regrets the acts, the confession was a release for him."
kurier.at.204625.4: He added that his client was "racked by remorse and very taken by the scale of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: If convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros, according to the prosecutor's office.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic Cathedral of Saint Peter and Saint Paul in Nantes was badly damaged in a fire on Saturday night last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three widely separated places in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The suspect, who is now in custody, had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: However, he was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for closing the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no evidence of forced entry into the church, he quickly came to the attention of investigators.
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended thinking about abolishing the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German soccer should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," Grindel told Bild am Sonntag.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed, "For the clubs that are most likely to pose a threat to Bayern and Dortmund, the 50+1 rules don't work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, there is no getting around the debate as to whether it is not necessary to make it easier for clubs that want to break into this phalanx to involve investors."
infranken.de.309597.6: But he said he doubted whether there was a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority stakes, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to draw investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a single European market," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees a danger that "attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will only end up weakening the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more excitement in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV money would not achieve a decisive effect, he said.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern makes a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: So the differences are already immense among the top three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million," the 58-year-old explained.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who noticed this mistake and leaked it to the press instead of addressing me about it," Grindel said of accepting an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "That has already bothered me a lot on a human level".
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift, worth around 11,000 euros, from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the consequences," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I dealt with the ominous watch gift in a completely transparent and guileless manner.
infranken.de.309597.19: After all, many people in the DFB knew about it."
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift," the 58-year-old assured.
infranken.de.309597.21: "You might call that naive, but in any case this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have come to a head again due to Donald Trump's use of federal police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday, clashes broke out between protesters and police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a demonstration procession was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Earlier, clashes again broke out in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: Security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas and violently dispersed demonstrators Saturday night.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of protesters, some armed, marched through Louisville, Kentucky, on Saturday demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old college student had been shot and killed in March during a drug raid at her Louisville apartment.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there at all, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: Three people were injured Saturday when a member of a group calling itself an armed alliance of black Americans fired a shot.
faz.79601.12: They were taken to the hospital, according to NBC.
faz.79601.13: None of them was in danger of death.
faz.79601.14: Police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not clash.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, one person was shot and died in the course of a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: Police said they had taken a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: It did not provide further details on the circumstances of the crime so far.
faz.79601.19: According to the New York Times, Mayor Steve Adler said he, like many in the city, was "heartbroken and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Protesters also clashed with police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction trailers outside a juvenile detention center, and police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police officers or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters smashed windows, launched fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.25: The fire was quickly put out.
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a Denver suburb in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd of people demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: Police said one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was taken to the hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed and a fire was set in a courthouse there as well, police said.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big bash in the spa town was missing, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: the Rakoczy weekend without Rakoczy-Fest.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: even though the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights like Saale burns, Rakoczy Ball or pageant, many got their money's worth at the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: Guests have taken to it well, she adds.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy Festival, when also the historical alone were the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser and her husband have been visiting Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy Festival for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: So also this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watching the historians stroll by and listening to the live Cuban music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I find it quite pleasant as it is," Konhäuser says.
infranken.de.309607.13: She doesn't miss the crowds that usually accompany Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But she misses the usual program highlights, first and foremost Saale brennt on Friday evening, as well as the historical pageant and the closing fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year," she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy horse show to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who in a normal year participates in the pageant and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgarten Café.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year, she was in costume on foot in the city on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's already more exhausting, otherwise we have it easier," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, although individual riders were out and about in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille will be allowed to take place again next year," says chairwoman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy horse show will also be held again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases at Spanish second-division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: Spanish second-division soccer club CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper into crisis because of a Corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to the city of A Coruña for a match on July 20 despite the first cases of corona, one low blow has followed the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, with one hospitalized, according to the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada, from the town of the same name southwest of Madrid, still had a chance to reach the promotion playoffs until now.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now it is even threatened with relegation to the B group of the Second Division.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was canceled at the last moment, the public prosecutor's office is investigating a possible crime against public health, and the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the club's forced relegation.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players, as well as other team members, are sitting in quarantine in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they have not received a fresh towel or gel," the sports newspaper AS wrote.
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos showed players hanging underwear and club clothes to dry in their rooms at the hotel after apparently having to wash them themselves, it said.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: Also, the bed linen had not been changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It was neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The accusation of deliberately endangering public health was rejected by the club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: They had not violated the Corona rules established by the Football Federation, stressed the son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, as reported by the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca".
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before the departure, there had been four infected people until July 19, but they were all isolated and did not travel.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Just before Monday's flight to A Coruña, all players and team members had been tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, "five or six" other team members tested positive for Corona.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was canceled 60 minutes before kickoff, Tebas Llanas said.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police have to catch runaway horses near Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led them back to their owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 o'clock, a road user reported two horses running loose on the feeder road between the Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld junction and the Theres freeway junction.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already between the feeder road and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the officers were able to gain the horses' trust shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope tied around them that was carried in the patrol car.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation conceivable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about continuing his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt/Main - Seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently defining the framework conditions with the team as to how and in what form it could continue," the 35-year-old told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung."
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team were also about the number of racing days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: In the past, he said, he would get up after a crash and the first thought would be, "Quickly get back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think, "What if?
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there were definitely aspects that he was increasingly struggling with.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it did me good to realize, based on the Corona time, what I have in cycling and how much I enjoy it."
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to competitive action at the Tour de l'Ain (Aug. 5-9).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four deaths on Bavaria's roads over the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers in many places on the roads.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour with the motorcycle ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several, mostly young people died in accidents on Bavaria's roads over the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit on Saturday near Schönthal (district of Cham) by a car that came into the opposite lane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car moved into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his bike on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to police, he was traveling downhill near Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left-hand bend, he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man was slightly injured, according to police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Kötzting in the Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road in the night to Sunday and was run over by a 42-year-old car driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The car driver could not brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: Near Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district), a 57-year-old biker collided head-on with a car in a right-hand bend on Saturday, despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered shock, the other three people in the car were uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was addressed on Saturday by Bavaria's Transport Minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underride protection on crash barriers and the defusing of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "For the safety of motorcyclists, we have thus achieved a lot in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorized two-wheeler riders killed was reduced by about 28 percent compared to 2011."
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - For soccer coach Niko Kovac, his new club AS Monaco will soon have a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champions will be guests of the Hessians, the Croatian's former club, on August 1 (6 p.m.).
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only acid test before the second leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (August 6).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the encounter will be played without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends," Kovac explained.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: In sporting terms, it will be an interesting test, the 48-year-old said.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before his move to FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hessen from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB Cup.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us in view of the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurt players, I'm looking forward to the reunion with Niko Kovac," said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croatian at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, Frankfurt had lost the round of 16 first leg against Basel 0:3 in their own stadium.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Nearly 50 new infections: Hof county narrowly misses lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In Hof County, the number of known new Corona infections increased further over the weekend, from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in these statistics) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is one case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: Thus, the Hof area is approaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 dead from monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: Severe flooding in Southeast Asia has affected more than 9 million people, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: Due to the heavy monsoon rains, a total of 700 people lost their lives.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.7: Armored rhinos in national park die in landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 armored rhinos died due to landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are protected and considered endangered.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly bad, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: Bangladesh is one of the countries hardest hit by global warming, according to the United Nations.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the town of Cox's Bazar in southern Bangladesh, the government has built apartments for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to get people to Cox's Bazar.
euronews-de.199228.16: Also, enthusiasm is holding up in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Those who used to have a house, however small and resembling a shack, often do not want to spend their lives in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments stand empty, but are soon to be occupied - or so the government wants - by those who lost their homes in the floods.
oe24.at.258757.1: 60 new corona infections in just one day in Vienna
oe24.at.258757.2: In a 24-hour comparison, 60 new Corona infections were reported in Vienna - in Lower Austria there were 22 new infections.
oe24.at.258757.3: The Vienna Provincial Directorate of Public Health and the Medical Crisis Unit of the City of Vienna provide regular updates on the current number of cases and other key figures related to the Covid 19 virus: as of 8:00 a.m. on Sunday, July 26, 2020, 4,840 (+60) positive tests have been confirmed in Vienna.
oe24.at.258757.4: The number of deaths associated with the virus remains unchanged at 204.
oe24.at.258757.6: 22 new coronavirus infections in Lower Austria.
oe24.at.258757.7: The number of coronavirus infections in Lower Austria increased by 22 on Sunday to now 3,288.
oe24.at.258757.8: One sick person has newly recovered, according to the Sanitätsstab.
oe24.at.258757.9: This brings the number of those who have recovered to 2,936.
oe24.at.258757.10: Currently sick with Covid-19 in the state were 247 patients.
oe24.at.258757.11: To date, 147,253 tests have been performed.
oe24.at.258757.12: 105 people died in connection with the lung disease.
handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "This would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair," it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors."
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second-largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: That is why Argentina is demanding that its private creditors waive part of their claims of around 66 billion U.S. dollars (about 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country will once again be threatened with national bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentina's history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, the lenders had demanded higher interest rates on the government bonds and changes to some of the contract clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in the midst of a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate recently exceeded 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts expect the economy to shrink by around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had failed to settle interest claims amounting to 503 million U.S. dollars and had thus slipped into a limited payment default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "It's going super well" - this is the conclusion Dr. Stefanie Kramer draws after her first days at the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything happened very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she would be succeeding Lutz Feller in the Eggenfelden notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been running at full speed.
pnp.de.390078.5: "Privately, however, I still have to arrive," she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to move the center of her life completely from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native of Dingolfingen.
pnp.de.390078.7: Currently, she and her husband, who works as a judge at the district court in Regensburg, are looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to take care of their two daughters (3½ and 1½ years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, she also has a place to stay with her parents in Dingolfing for the time being, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Having grown up in the neighboring district, she has of course long been familiar with the town of Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits to the town with her family over the past few months, she has recently discovered that "Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town.
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had won the race for the vacant position in the selection process.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her native Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and the second state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several stations as a notary public, among others in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Unterallgäu as well as Regensburg - during this time she also shouldered her doctorate in labor law "on the side" - she took up her first position as a notary public in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she took parental leave, which was followed by a move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken on substitute services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for her full professional re-entry, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: Dr. Stefanie Kramer has completely taken over the team of her predecessor, who in the future will be taking over the notary's office as a vacation replacement - and immediately has praise for the team at the office: "It's going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes here makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of her private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: She has already contacted a local facility about kindergarten and daycare places.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything goes as planned, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and to get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans maximum 15,000 spectators for league start
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund Germany's largest soccer stadium in Dortmund will not even be 20 percent full at the start of the season if fans return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulations, which are mandatory, we are planning on 12,000 to 15,000 spectators as things stand," Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer told the Tagesspiegel newspaper.
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the Revierstadt holds just over 81,000 spectators for Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In last season's ghost games caused by the Corona pandemic, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that some of the 4,000 or so seats in the hospitality area can be reopened in addition to the normal spectator seats: "It is of course a blow to the bottom line if these revenues are completely lost."
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing Corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable side-length for the time being".
an-online.de.487062.8: "When many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people are on short-time work in Germany alone, the need for entertainment is limited," Cramer explained.
an-online.de.487062.9: Dortmund's marketing boss praised BVB's professionals for their partial salary sacrifice to help overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary sacrifice has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work."
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start in life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: That's what Gabriel was when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for at the Children's Hospital in Graz every year.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with a birth weight of less than one kilogram.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully formed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so delicate that they could injure the electrodes of an EKG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't be in voice - "and how," Berndt Urlesberger grins.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if, of course, they don't scream quite as loudly as big babies."
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona theater in the classroom: The 9th classes of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd experienced the whiteboard as a stage shortly before the start of the vacations.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to talk about the play and the performance with the actress and the director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born out of the current Corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was pleased about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if at the end all participants agreed that the direct encounter in the theater and stage space would offer additional attractions, one sees in the theater also the potentials for contact in the schools.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, this could become an interesting addition to the play," emphasized director Winfried Tobias.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.1: First round draw: TSV 1860 would face Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB Cup.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: If TSV 1860 qualifies for the DFB Cup, the Lions will meet Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This was the result of the draw on Sunday.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.4: Munich - Sechzig's possible opponent in the first round of the DFB Cup has been determined.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.5: The Lions would meet Eintracht Frankfurt if they successfully qualify.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.6: This was the result of the draw on Sunday evening in the ARD sports show.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.7: Because the field of participants is not yet complete due to the Corona pandemic, wild cards were used in the draw.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.8: Due to the voluntary waiver of semi-final opponent FC Memmingen, TSV 1860 is already in the final of the Bavarian Toto Cup (September 4 or 5).
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.9: There, the Lions will face either Würzburger Kickers or Viktoria Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.10: Should Würzburg, promoted from the second division, reach the final, Sechzig would already be qualified for the first round of the DFB Cup.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.11: Otherwise, the Giesinger team would have to beat regional league side Aschaffenburg in the final.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.12: The first round of the DFB Cup will be played between September 11 and 14 and thus one week before the start of the third division.
mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104, her spokeswoman confirmed to Deutsche Presse-Agentur.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the Southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California while still a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: Austrian theater man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia in Shakespeare's "A Midsummer Night's Dream."
mz-web.de.376296.7: The Warner Brothers film studio immediately signed her for seven years and brought her to fame alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She shot eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946, she won her first Oscar in the lead role of "To Each His Own."
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was released in Germany under the title "Mutterherz."
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for best actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress."
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received much recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit."
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier suggested her for the leading role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel" in 1952.
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her longtime friend Bette Davis, she starred in "Lullaby for a Corpse."
mz-web.de.376296.16: Her marriage to writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) produced their son Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath, meanwhile, were never confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole/Wickler miss final on comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: World Championship runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final at the "Road to Timmendorf" beach volleyball tournament.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Düsseldorf, they lost in the semifinals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars Flüggen with 1:2 (17:21, 21:17, 19:21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Thole/Wickler last played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their vanquishers Ehlers/Flüggen conceded a 0:2 (17:21, 17:21) defeat to surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German Championships were played out in Timmendorfer Strand at the beginning of September: Armin Dollinger/Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms/Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner/Milan Sievers secured the tickets.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz expulsion from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf".
paz-online.de.95211.2: The exclusion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is, in the view of the FDP, only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the far-right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of radicals in the AfD," FDP interior politician Benjamin Strasser told the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed the exclusion of Kalbitz on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of hearing, which the Federal Executive Committee had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD were really concerned with consistently removing right-wing extremists from its party, functionaries like Björn Höcke as well as his supporters would have been expelled long ago," Strasser said.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will in the AfD to do this, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU Secretary General Markus Blume expressed a similar view: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz now remains excluded says nothing and changes nothing," he told the Welt am Sonntag newspaper.
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Rather, it speaks volumes about how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist still has in the middle of the AfD."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume expects the AfD to end up below five percent again in future elections.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The AfD's days in parliaments are numbered," he said.
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen for the officially now disbanded "wing" around Thuringia AfD state and parliamentary group leader Björn Höcke; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the strand as a "secured right-wing extremist effort."
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive committee had thrown Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: The reason it gave was that Kalbitz had not declared previous membership of the now-banned far-right "Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: Sebastian Walter, chairman of the left-wing parliamentary group in Brandenburg's state parliament, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court does not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains an extreme right-wing party, with or without Kalbitz."
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party is weakened with this decision, nor the right wing, he said.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The maneuver of the Meuthen troops is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to escape further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and are trying to get through under the radar," Walter said.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD will not get rid of the ghosts it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion still changes nothing," commented Brandenburg SPD Secretary General Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here, the AfD state association and the parliamentary group stood by their right-wing leader until today."
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: This announced on Saturday, he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal arbitration court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: In the first six months of the year, wind farms on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period last year, the grid operator Tennet announced in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for transmitting North Sea electricity to the mainland and forwarding it through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: Wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, fed in another 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: In total, wind power from the North Sea and Baltic Sea thus comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to just over 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: Wind harvesting at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of total wind power in Germany; that's about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms provide higher generation capacity
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind power results from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind farms in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could mathematically generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: By 2030, it is expected to increase to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind farms can't reach their full capacity even offshore, but reach about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is Jan. 2, when North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, the equivalent of three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmünder Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: This was almost a small anniversary celebration of the 130.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Birthday of the Gmünder Kunstverein: The exhibition opening "Skirmish" with works of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold broke the usual frame after the Corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery, the association "Sandtogether" got involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled because of Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has canceled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We truly did not take this decision lightly and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute," explained Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-party).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately we are responsible here as organizers for the health of many thousands of people".
dnn-online.de.39567.7: Because if tens of thousands had streamed onto the festival grounds and into the marquee, it would not have been possible to maintain minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current Corona Protection Ordinance.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that not much would have remained of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organizational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately by a multiple.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off until next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital will celebrate its 100th anniversary with, among other things, the Winterberg Festival from May 7 to 9, 2021, and the Day of the Saxons from September 10 to 12, 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Olympic dressage champion Werth unbeatable in Achleiten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg came to four victories in four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning a Grand Prix each with Weihegold and Quantaz at the start, she was also unbeatable in the Grand Prix Special and the Freestyle on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: Riding the 15-year-old mare Weihegold, Werth clearly beat the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen in the Special on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: The German was also clearly ahead of her 34-year-old pupil Victoria Max-Theurer in the freestyle on Saturday on Quantaz.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The world's most successful dressage rider is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Already at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago, Werth had won all the important four tests.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international shows is scheduled there for August 14 to 16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Worms continues to take to the skies: "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" endows a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: The professorship will enable students to start their studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and the DFS Air Navigation Services Academy will be evenly utilised.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on establishing and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester of 2019, the first students have been on the Air Traffic Management course at Worms University as part of their training to become air traffic controllers.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, the experience of DFS has been very positive, and the performance of the students is excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and air traffic controller training is making a significant contribution to further enhancing the attractiveness of the air traffic controller profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, funding is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to be able to continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel," said Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman and CEO of DFS, at the signing of the agreement.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing our good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpinning our attractiveness as an employer."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also emphasized by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With this professorship, we would like to build on the existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree program in Air Traffic Management."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust placed in us by Deutsche Flugsicherung is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research expertise in the future fields of air traffic.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: In its commitment to the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative focal points for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary in the Ministry of Science, Further Education and Culture, emphasized: "With its focus on aviation, Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the university's profile."
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue helicopter lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: For about 30 minutes, the A 45 highway was fully closed at noon on Saturday in the direction of Aschaffenburg, because the rescue helicopter was in action after a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old man drove a Ford straight ahead in the curve at the Alzenau-Mitte exit at around 12:40 p.m. and landed on the guard rail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The impact caused the front airbags to deploy, the driver suffered minor injuries to his face and had to be taken to hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries to the 72-year-old female passenger were treated by the emergency physician and the patient was subsequently flown to a hospital by rescue helicopter.
main-netz.de.61826.6: At present, however, the police assume that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, to which a damage of approximately 2000 euro resulted, had to be towed away.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil to examine other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The Corona crisis again brought to light the conditions in parts of the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.3: Tightening of the law is imminent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they legal - and will they remain so?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Labor Minister Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to review other industries after the strict regulations against abuses in the meat industry that are now planned.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for each industry if necessary," Heil told the Deutsche Presse-Agentur in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: Following the mass corona outbreak at meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the federal cabinet plans to pass a bill by Heil this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to use outside personnel for slaughtering, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: In addition, the use of contract workers and temporary workers is to be banned there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employers' President Ingo Kramer told dpa: "Hands off a general restriction of work contracts and temporary workers if you don't want to completely strangle the economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Contracts for work and services are, for example, for large areas of the skilled trades, the construction industry and plant engineering compellingly the basis for their value creation at the customer.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misconduct of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured, "My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.15: He added that work contracts make sense.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "If an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a security system, that is a perfectly normal contract for work and services."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work in its sector alone to be unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It is inexplicable why different labor laws should apply in the future to portioning and packaging cheese than to sausage, it says in a statement on the proposed law, as reported by the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: According to the statement, a ban would increase the consumer price by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: In many cases, Eastern European employees from work contract companies worked in the industry, according to the results of an audit by the NRW labor protection administration, sometimes 16 hours a day.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also found that the situation regarding housing for employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said a relatively harsh law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now it must be fundamentally cleaned up".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced, "In the Occupational Health and Safety Act, which we want to pass in the cabinet at the end of July, there are also measures that not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher inspection quotas for occupational health and safety or clear criteria for shared accommodation."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft submitted to dpa includes amendments to the law on safeguarding employee rights in the meat industry and to the Occupational Safety and Health Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) believes more intensive controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to do even more controls in many supervisory areas: Food controls, animal welfare, all kinds of things, for example, animal transports," Nonnemacher said Sunday on the RBB program "Brandenburg aktuell."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: But for more controls also more personnel places are necessary.
tt.com.148707.1: Three dead in ultralight plane crash in Germany
tt.com.148707.2: Three people died when an ultralight aircraft crashed into an apartment building in Wesel in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia, police said.
tt.com.148707.3: One child was slightly injured, they said.
