tt.com.148707.7: The house was said to be a one- or two-family house.
tt.com.148707.8: Further details were not disclosed at first.
rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Clearance of Frankfurt Opera Square proceeded peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: A week after the riots in Frankfurt, the evacuation of the Opera Square on Sunday night also passed peacefully.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: At last, a few dozen people were still on the square, but left before the curfew began at 1 o'clock.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been on duty with numerous officers since the early evening, and a larger police contingent could be seen throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend, a ban on entering the Opera Square, where riots had occurred a week ago, was in effect from midnight.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Police officers were attacked with bottles from the crowd of revelers.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: According to police reports, at least five officers were injured and several police vehicles were damaged.
rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The night to Saturday had also remained quiet.
hna.de.247362.1: Car overturns: Young woman seriously injured in accident on Bundesstrasse 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: In an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme, a 21-year-old woman suffered serious injuries at around 1:25 p.m. on Sunday.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to the Kassel hospital.
hna.de.247362.4: With thermal imaging cameras, the fire department searched for possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to police, the woman was on the Bundesstraße 83 in the direction of her home Hümme on the way, when her car for as yet unexplained cause from the road and overturned several times.
hna.de.247362.6: To rescue the victim, the fire department had to cut the roof of the car free.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent cornfield was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, had also been ordered to search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the emergency services did not find anyone among the tall corn plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured woman was taken by ambulance to Kassel Hospital for further treatment.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 emergency personnel from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire departments were on the scene.
hna.de.247362.12: The federal highway was closed for two hours because of the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redeeming goal by Cristiano Ronaldo, record champion Juventus Turin has secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer made the 36th Scudetto in club history perfect with a 2-0 (1-0) win over Sampdoria Genoa at home on Sunday evening.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.4: Ronaldo scored to make it 1-0 before halftime.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Torino, which was without former international Sami Khedira, who has been injured for a long time lately, can no longer be ousted from first place in Serie A two matchdays before the end of the season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Inter Milan, second in the table, is seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus was harmless in the first half despite visual superiority, then Ronaldo scored with the last action after a free kick.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old converted a pass from Miralem Pjanic directly with a low shot from the edge of the penalty area (45.+7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the now more offensive guests Ronaldo was also involved in the 2-0, after his shot Federico Bernardeschi (67th) dusted off.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lackluster, but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The penalty kick in the 89th minute, which hit the crossbar, may have only really irked Ronaldo himself in terms of the goalscoring standings.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: "It's complicated to stay on the ball mentally and physically for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange and the momentum changes very easily," said coach Maurizio Sarri still after the 1-2 defeat at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players was great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Because of the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to clinch the championship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: In the end, Juve owed its reassuring lead at the top of the table primarily to the weakness of its rivals.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: In the eleven games before Sunday's match, Sarri's team had only managed five victories.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also be the top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, former Dortmund player Ciro Immobile has 34 goals to his name after his treble in Lazio Roma's 5:1 (1:1) win over Hellas Verona - as many as Robert Lewandowski scored in FC Bayern's title win.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by current Juve pro Gonzalo Higuaín.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: The next title opportunity awaits the "Old Lady" of Italian soccer in August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are through to the last 16 of the Champions League, but must overturn a 1-0 first-leg defeat to Olympique Lyon on August 7 to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: Real Madrid or Manchester City would be waiting as opponents in the next knockout round.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threatened penalties and court rulings, drivers continue to step on the gas in countless illegal races on Baden-Württemberg's roads: last year and in the first four months of this year, police in the southwest have already recorded more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparative figures for previous years, but the speeders are increasingly making work for the judicial authorities: at the public prosecutor's offices between Constance and Mannheim, a total of 155 preliminary proceedings were conducted for illegal racing in 2018, a year later there were already 252 and in the current year up to the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, according to the Interior Ministry's response to a question from the state parliamentary SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or fled from the police - which is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeders caught and also asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed and 15 prison sentences handed down since 2018.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, because of the quite a few tragic accidents and lawsuits in past years, other motorists are reacting more sensitively than before and are reporting more frequently, a ministry spokesman said.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: Highway 8 is particularly popular with speeders, who repeatedly slow down traffic there to make room and use the open stretch for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught doing this near Kirchheim unter Teck, and three months earlier there were as many as 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: On the A81, the police even register more races than on any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: An attempt is being made there with a speed limit to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped-out sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers escape to Germany to speed because of the high penalties for speeding and car racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit should not be limited to a few stretches of road: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would get rid of this problem on highways," says Martin Rivoir, the traffic expert for the SPD's state parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you weren't still legally allowed to drive here and there at 200 kilometers per hour and more."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Anyone who flouts all the rules in such a way and puts not only their own life but also the lives of other road users at risk can hardly be reached with reason.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police action
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: For the ADAC, however, this is not enough: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, head of the traffic and environment department at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: He calls for additional and also tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed trial of strength turns into painful and momentous seriousness: since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people have died nationwide in the races, two of them bystanders in a nighttime crash in Stuttgart's city center and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: There, two young men allegedly engaged in a car race in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles went off the road, crashed into a garden wall and came to rest on its side, killing the 18-year-old passenger.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in the races over the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: Stricter penalties, however, are not necessary, according to Interior Minister Thomas Strobl: "Legislative need for action to sanction illegal motor vehicle racing more severely is not seen," the Interior Ministry paper says.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light of 23 July: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in Talstraße around 3:40 a.m. and ran in the direction of the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who helped himself to drinks from the refrigerator and subsequently left the snack bar through a previously smashed entrance door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled in the direction of the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to police, the burglar also helped himself to a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong build.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: During the crime, he was wearing a black hooded sweatshirt, black pants and light-colored shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Further witness information is accepted by the police.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann has claimed his second stage win on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old from the German Palatinate of Team Bora-hansgrohe prevailed in a bunch sprint on the 109-kilometer section with start and finish in Sibiu after he had already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was wins three and four for Ackermann this season.
pnp.de.390142.5: In the overall standings, his Austrian team-mate Gregor Mühlberger came out on top.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders had started the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No fewer than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the new season with a victory," Ackermann had declared after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: With 300 meters to go, he had simply tightened his sprint, "and it also worked out perfectly."
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the world governing body UCI, a Corona test was carried out on all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, riders and support staff were separated from the organizing team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for layman reanimation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In a multi-family house a child (4) lay suddenly lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire department, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 pm.
bild.254818.5: "A control center dispatcher immediately gave instructions for lay resuscitation," a fire department spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue forces took over the resuscitation measures a little later.
bild.254818.7: The child, whose life was in danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.8: It is unclear why the accident occurred.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started the investigation into the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire department spokesman: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning meeting - police intervene, 700 cars and about 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" on Saturday night in the parking lot of a furniture store.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to control such events more intensively.
infranken.de.309656.4: A large tuning meeting occurred on Saturday night (July 25, 2020) in Nuremberg Südstadt.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the Central Franconia police, at around 10:30 p.m., Nuremberg traffic police noticed an increased volume of vehicles in the area of a large parking lot in Ingolstädter Straße.
infranken.de.309656.7: The police then carried out a large number of vehicle checks there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police had announced that they wanted to take stronger action against so-called car posers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: only a small number from the "scene
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers counted a good 700 vehicles and about 1100 people at the peak, the police reported.
infranken.de.309656.11: Of these, however, only a small part of those present could be assigned to the "car poser" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the appeal of the police.
infranken.de.309656.13: On the basis of the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the vast majority of those present complied with the applicable infection control regulations, in particular the observance of the minimum distance and the wearing of a mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed at around 1:00 am.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officers found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be impounded.
infranken.de.309656.19: Illegal car racing had not taken place.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The Central Franconia police headquarters will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and will continue to carry out increased control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The News5 agency spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger of the towing company involved: "They all have nice rims, we must not scratch them," Schrödinger said.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for that.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also, because the cars are wider, the company has to be careful not to damage them, he said.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back undamaged".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Labor Agency figures: 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - The Federal Employment Agency (BA) says it is investigating around 900 suspected cases of misuse of short-time working benefits.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "With more than 880,000 companies reporting short-time work, that is extremely few," Daniel Terzenbach, the board member responsible for operations, told the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung newspaper.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When at the beginning of the Corona crisis suddenly very many companies had applied for short-time work, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the examination takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We did not have that much time in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: We will look all the more closely at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be some more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have staying power."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Indications of abuse often come from the employees concerned or from trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvencies in the fall.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than last year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: Estimates differ, but we are arming ourselves for the worst-case scenario and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency benefits."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still unremarkable, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden broken up
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The accumulation had been dissolved at 20.48 o'clock by the precinct drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the Foundation told PNN inquiry.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people had then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people had then played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by precinct drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again it comes to illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the foundation it comes again and again to accumulations, with which the distance and hygiene rules Covid-19-Umgangsverordnung are not kept.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June, there was a celebration with about 300 people in the Babelsberg Park, and a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a Corona ordinance, the parks are closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: According to the park regulations, camping on the meadows is prohibited, and there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors were leaving more and more trash behind and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the Neukölln district, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was broken up by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after Corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a Corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to provincial authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to the report, many of those infected are young trainees in tourism businesses, but at least one vacation guest also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism employees were asked to stay in their accommodations on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations here and there" of bookings, the head of the Wolfgangsee tourism association, Hans Wieser, told dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: There have also been isolated guests who have left early, he said.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist destination in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, about a third of the guests are German.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections had become public knowledge.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended on Saturday the behavior of the trainees, who had celebrated in several pubs and may have been infected.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all liked to do that in our youth," he told radio station Ö1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism board launched an information campaign to make young employees aware of the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: Hundreds of employees, vacationers and locals were then tested starting Saturday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: Additionally, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang as of July 15 were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak brings back memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a center of Corona spread throughout Europe during the early stages of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people are currently infected with the virus in Austria.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The main areas of new infections are Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - English soccer record champions Manchester United are returning to the Champions League after a year's absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the final matchday of the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) win over direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes will now have to settle for the Europa League because Chelsea FC passed them by and also qualified for the top flight in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the battle against relegation, Aston Villa was able to celebrate.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead through a penalty kick by Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90.+8) scored the final goal.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, FC Bayern's opponent in the Champions League round of 16, won 2-0 (2:0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers in parallel thanks to Mason Mount (45.+1) and Olivier Giroud (45.+4).
wn.de.700458.9: "It means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Also benefiting from Chelsea's win over Wolverhampton was Tottenham Hotspur, which edged past Wolves with a meager 1-1 (1-0) draw at Crystal Palace to start sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble for a long time at West Ham United.
wn.de.700458.12: Jack Grealish's late lead (84th) was immediately cancelled out by Andrej Jarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: The 1:1 (0:0) was enough, however, because Watford lost 2:3 (1:3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which fired three coaches during the season, is relegated after five first division years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could not save itself with a 3:1 (2:1) at Everton FC.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, they were one point short.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, which has been the English champion since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) win at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points are the highest the Reds have ever scored in a soccer season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team just missed the points record in English soccer.
wn.de.700458.20: The best mark is held by Manchester City with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After Newcastle took the lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game around for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: "It's been an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," scorer van Dijk said after the game, "that should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: Satisfied should also be the Premier League bosses in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, soccer operations in England were interrupted from March 13 to June 17.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there were even discussions about premature termination or playing the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season was played to a close without any particular incidents - albeit, as in Germany, without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: Protests in Israel against head of government Netanyahu are becoming more violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: Violent clashes have occurred during the night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: Israeli police violently cracked down on participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative head of government Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem on Sunday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to break up the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: A total of about 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening, according to media reports.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They were protesting unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu were also arrested, the news site "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other locations in Israel, including outside the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: One man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray from a moving car at protesters on the side of the road, according to police.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator had been lightly wounded in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv recently.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he has been accused of hasty easing and a lack of preparation for a second Corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The Corona crisis has taken a heavy toll on the country's economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently exceeded 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the corona virus in Israel recently rose to ever new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes into car - nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision caused nine light injuries on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen.
bild.254850.3: A car driver was traveling with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Presumably she had braked suddenly because she wanted to turn".
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes transporter, who was driving behind her, must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the van.
bild.254850.7: Three occupants in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took them to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after Corona suspect case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far considered its own measures to ward off the corona virus a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now, for the first time, the country is reporting a suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official suspected corona case in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defense measures over the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency had been declared for the region around the border city of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership declared the highest level of alert.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea said it had not registered a single infection so far and described its defensive measures as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The disease symptoms were reportedly detected in a "runaway" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person had absconded to South Korea three years ago and had now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea of the border crossing within the four-kilometer-wide military buffer zone, most of which is still mined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: South Korea's military, however, acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were running to this to some persons.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea said it called an emergency meeting of the Workers' Party Politburo, chaired by strongman Kim Jong Un, on Saturday over the suspicion.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure to "completely blockade Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others," the statement added.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person involved, as well as all people in Kaesong who had had contact with him, had been quarantined, it said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: According to the statement, the party's central military commission will investigate the "runaway case" as well as the behavior of the military unit responsible and impose harsh punishment if necessary.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: According to estimates, about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of council meeting: City East and noise abatement up for discussion before big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental topics, the committee members will also vote, among other things, on the development plan for the major project City Center Development East," it says rather casually in the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4:30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all the upgrading of the eastern city center is discussed controversially to the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for it are scarce, last in individual committees depending upon attendance even rejecting.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the business community (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project, which was developed from the citizenry and then by the administration and the city council, fail now after almost ten years of preparation, was criticized by project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "clueless", "speculation", "disparagement" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," said Klein, who has been a member of the local council for a year as the sole representative of the Bürgerliste Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, he said, after reading the contracts, he is in this position: "I know what I'm talking about."
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit comes the city cheaper, the technical city hall is contrary to statements of the city administration after subsidies, of whose existence Klein is convinced, for 8.5 million euros to redevelop.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop quite differently than is predicted in the city hall and by the supporters from the business community.
pz-news.de.72354.10: To shape the city by its own power and not an investor: That was his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP/FW/UB/LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: In essence, it also provides for the renovation of the Technical City Hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting the ex-Thale for administrative space and a small-scale inner city redevelopment, ideally with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This contains various measures for the protection of the population of Pforzheim from health-related noise pollution caused by road traffic, including in many cases speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local German Transport Club welcomes the widespread introduction of 30 km/h. However, the politically responsible people in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must come about in this way, because they have contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting the regular bus service with thinned-out intervals and by little commitment to bicycle traffic, says the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: Likewise the local council votes on the participation of the city of the energy and climatic protection agency Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: Also on the agenda is the accession to the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, the redefinition of parental contributions in the municipal day care centers and the application for inclusion in the Smart City funding of the federal government.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed Corona protections.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: After much delay, Tim Zimmermann starts the new season
schwaebische.de.113555.2: After a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his premiere season in the ADAC GT Masters on July 31.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operations, the first test drives were now scheduled.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, the main focus was on getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from tackling his first service drive in the new Lamborghini Huracan from Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: Under special hygienic conditions this was now possible.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen did his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his premiere in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With the ABS, for example, you have to take the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun."
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new teammate in many ways.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "After all, I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series also brings new challenges," Zimmermann says.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get on brilliantly and we also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: That's exactly where - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: Starting on July 31, the 33 supercars will race through the Lausitz.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 series newcomers, knows the track, however.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: He was last a guest at the Motodrom in 2015.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked out quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track very much," says Zimmermann, who competes for the Friedrichshafen-based Graf Zeppelin racing team.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit perfectly to be fast."
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is then will be revealed in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play a little poker during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled between now and the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current status is that no spectators will be allowed - but there will be a celebrity guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will take to the GT wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British transport minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has, according to press reports, caught the country's transport minister cold.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: According to the report, Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Because of the Corona numbers rising again in Spain, the Cabinet in London deleted the country from the list of those countries from which entry is possible without quarantine requirements.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation applies from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the regulation applies to those who are just on the deadline vacation, only from Saturday, August 1, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Spain, by the way, is considered in Austria until now as one of the "safe countries" for which no quarantine is needed in Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Numerous ministers may have known in advance that there was a possibility that a quarantine would be imposed on holidaymakers Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to let Grant Shapps know".
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the Corona emergency in Spain and the expiration of the strict curfew, the infection figures in the country are rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists blame nightlife in particular for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the favorite vacation destinations of the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: From not necessary Reisens on the Spanish mainland the British government advises at present, the Canaries and Balearen particularly popular with British holiday-makers are excluded from it.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been recorded in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced on the occasion of his country's Navy Day that warships will be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, unique in the world, would expand the combat capabilities of Russia's naval forces, Putin said Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: The Defense Ministry also provided information on successful tests of the Zirkon hypersonic missile built for the Navy, according to the Interfax agency.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a speed of sound many times greater than the speed of sound, about 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction also continues on the Poseidon nuclear-tipped underwater torpedo, it said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned naval drone is designed to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also rode in a military boat, said that 40 new ships would be commissioned this year alone at the various fleet units of the world's largest country.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has a coastal area larger than any other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the navy has reliably protected Russia, Putin said at the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: Naval forces in many other Russian coastal locations also celebrated Navy Day with parades.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside strongman Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at an arms display in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: On display in a video released by the Defense Ministry were not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help hampered because of Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this season over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening flooding, strong winds and heavy rains now threatened parts of the U.S. state, the National Hurricane Center of the U.S. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) announced Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for numerous counties.
tt.com.149061.5: The Corona pandemic rampant in Texas complicates the work of aid workers, Abbott said further, according to U.S. media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Any hurricane is a tremendous challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle newspaper.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the hurricane in Texas, he added, "That challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most Covid-19-affected area in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, about 5,000 people have died so far in Texas alone as a result of the Corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott urged people who would have to leave their homes to be cautious.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "we have become accustomed to," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to the CBS network.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important for everyone to keep their distance, he said.
tt.com.149061.13: For that reason, he said, hotel rooms have been made available in some locations.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, it should be tested in emergency shelters on Corona, he said.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage had initially been reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" had made landfall on Padre Island just off the Texas coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: A storm surge warning had initially been issued for the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent and was later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected weakening as "Hanna" moved further inland and headed toward northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific Ocean, Hurricane "Douglas" was headed toward Hawaii Sunday night with winds of about 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it should be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average active hurricane season this year, according to a May forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes can be expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the agency had said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into major storms.
tt.com.149061.28: Given available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, and that of a below-average season is only 10 percent, it said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: U.S. President Donald Trump wrote via Twitter that his administration was closely monitoring the storms and was in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals disallowed: Video assistant "punishes" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic was disallowed two goals at once
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals disallowed: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch black evening in the 0:2 (0:1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian Football League Serie A - and was really angry with the video assistant referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of not given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR been so harsh on a team," commented the "Corriere dello Sport".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Napoli had taken the lead through a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, and Filip Djuricic initially celebrated the equalizer in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) took the goal back because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were also taken back by the referee team after the VAR pointed it out.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In stoppage time, Allan made the final score 2-0 for Napoli and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a speed trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology is setting records," writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began for double winners FC Bayern with a setback.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well" after a short vacation and a few days of training, will have to think about how to rebuild his successful defense after the first team training session after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes of action behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfield boss Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to his left ankle and is in danger of missing crucial top-flight duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In Munich's mucky weather, the right-back broke off a training match and was driven off the pitch in a golf cart.
wn.de.700404.6: It remains to be seen how long the unrestricted regular will have to take a break in the fight for the title.
wn.de.700404.7: A deployment in the round of 16 second leg against Chelsea FC on August 8 is likely to be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on August 12 in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: The Bavarians, however, do not want to let the mishap from training on Sunday stop them.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on the road to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration are what his victory-hungry title collectors are expected to show in what would ideally be the 28 days between now and the final of the Champions League on August 23.
wn.de.700404.11: "We have mastered the compulsory tasks with the championship and cup simply outstanding.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it is a matter of creating the special still," said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: However, before the Munich team can get to grips with the final tournament and a training camp in the Algarve beforehand, they first have to play Chelsea FC in the round of 16.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners in the home arena should not become the Bayern nightmare again as in the lost "Final dahoam" 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and fill up confidence with a good game," demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test to get in the mood is scheduled for Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn in his stars, who had 13 days off after the double, for a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including the new players around noble purchase Leroy Sané, who met all new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his transfer from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Leroy has fitted in well, as have all the newcomers," Flick reported.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer only allowed to train with, Flick talked much rather about the current title project of the German serial champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, they are now training in team strength for the Londoners, who, unlike Flick's ensemble, are in the rhythm of the game.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, the Munich team could face a quarterfinal against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, with Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin possible opponents in the semifinals.
wn.de.700404.24: A path to the final in Lisbon "is not that easy," stressed the head coach, who from Tuesday can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training.
wn.de.700404.25: Klose, a World Cup record scorer, and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation what is particularly important in the 0-on-100 preparation.
wn.de.700404.26: Working with his current team is "a pleasure," Flick praised.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine-man teams was also an ambitious affair on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: Of the top performers, all were there, including Thiago, who is eager to leave, and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts beyond the premier league season are not assured.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to crown its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to race on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the world championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All races in the Americas, meanwhile, have been canceled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar becomes more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The race calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten Grand Prix confirmed so far, three more race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, races are to be held at the Nürburgring in Germany and Portimão in Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will be fighting for world championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: As things stand, this means that the 2020 race calendar will comprise 13 rounds.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are delighted that we continue to make great progress in finalizing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races are expected to be completed in the premier class of motorsport during this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 plans to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: Before the races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December, which have already been officially targeted, media reports suggest that there could still be appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia at the end of November.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, Formula 1's regulations require at least races on three continents for the world championship to be awarded.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as is currently planned, races are only held on two continents, there is to be one world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles, citing "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the emerging corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent this year is not an option.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be visiting America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense Corona situation, the races in Canada, the U.S., Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being back with them next season," Carey explained.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the Americas races was met with criticism, particularly in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, he said, the infection figures in the São Paulo area are much lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: Moreover, the concerns of some teams about not wanting to race in Brazil would not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They were prepared for the required safety measures, he said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil look against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her encounter with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's popular latenight show via video chat and revealed in an interview what was on her mind during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US latenight show via video chat.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also talked about her famous "evil eye" when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - In the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg drew attention to herself with her tireless efforts for the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke on a popular latenight show about her plans for the future, as well as her encounter with U.S. President Donald Trump at the UN Climate Summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed the 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: In it, she talked not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she opined.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people will go to shift the focus away from the climate crisis" shocked her, she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of kids take to the streets" is what she experienced, she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She finds heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other response."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: Things got particularly interesting toward the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was asked about a famous scene in which she gave U.S. President Trump a bitter look.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN Climate Summit in New York, for which the actvist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive look was caught on camera and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip was turned into a GIF, or animated image, which ultimately became one of the most used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the U.S. president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: In response to Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she replied only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert probably didn't expect this quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture laughing for a moment.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: She was remembered by many at the climate conference for her "How dare you?" speech on the principles of climate protection.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmund Immobile with triple pack for Lazio Roma
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now tied with Bayern's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Boot.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: Former Dortmund player Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming the top scorer in the Italian soccer championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB pro contributed three goals in Lazio Roma's 5-1 (1-1) win at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in stoppage time of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: With two games to go, the 30-year-old now has 34 goals to his name from the fourth-placed team in the table - the same number scored by FC Bayern München's Robert Lewandowski in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy, Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar met with the leader in the evening still Sampdoria Genoa.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: after a rapid rise with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Genius guitarist, drug junkie, cult devotee: the co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members announced in an official statement on Saturday, with a further statement to be announced in the coming days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton paid tribute to Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood, in an emotional response, spoke of a "monumental loss" for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Fleetwood, a drummer, and Green, a guitarist, had formed the now long legendary band in London in 1967; his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" remains unforgotten to this day.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game," "In The Skies") resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid ascent - but the band then celebrated its greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there is said to have been a dispute because Green wanted to donate all the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Just three years after forming, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in a psychiatric ward.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He reportedly lived on the streets at times, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent time on an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a working-class Jewish family in London's Bethnal Green neighborhood.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: At a young age, he became fascinated with U.S. blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: He learned his first guitar chords at the age of eleven.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager started playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be on stage as the lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Not long after, he was hired to replace his idol Eric Clapton in the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green formed Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 with fellow Bluesbreakers members Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross," composed by Green, gave the group its first number one hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green couldn't cope with the media hype, and his experiments with the drug LSD became increasingly extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on his life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that happened to me in life was the drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Toward the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac, meanwhile, was riding a wave of success without him in a new formation.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not manage a major comeback until 1996, when he relaunched with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: At the time, the British "Daily Telegraph" spoke of a rock star who had returned to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band broke up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his smooth sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
